row.process:
:SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"* doesnt exist yet*") :SET &UC4RB_WAS_SERVER_LIST# = "" :DEFINE &ARRAY#, string, 2 :PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#) : SET &server_node# = STR_SUB(&line#, " doesnt exist yet","") : FILL &ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&server_node#, " of node ") : SET &UC4RB_WAS_SERVER_LIST# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_SERVER_LIST#,",") : SET &UC4RB_WAS_SERVER_LIST# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_SERVER_LIST#,&ARRAY#[1]) : SET &UC4RB_WAS_NODE_LIST# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_NODE_LIST#,",") : SET &UC4RB_WAS_NODE_LIST# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_NODE_LIST#,&ARRAY#[2]) :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &hnd#
:SET &LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_WAS_SERVER_LIST#) :IF &LENGTH# > 1 : SET &UC4RB_WAS_SERVER_LIST# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_WAS_SERVER_LIST#,2) : PUBLISH &UC4RB_WAS_SERVER_LIST#,,"WORKFLOW" :ENDIF
:SET &LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_WAS_NODE_LIST#) :IF &LENGTH# > 1 : SET &UC4RB_WAS_NODE_LIST# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_WAS_NODE_LIST#,2) : PUBLISH &UC4RB_WAS_NODE_LIST#,,"WORKFLOW" :ENDIF
